Interpol is utterly convinced that the black-market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.

Do I know him?
Indirectly. He works for an old friend of yours.

translation.en: Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.

The only thing you can do.

Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.

I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.ja: 私は人を遠ざけた そのほうが安心だから

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.ja: あとどれだけ 大切な人と 過ごせるか分からない

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.ja: もう時間を 無駄にしないと約束して

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen,
before we light our tree,
we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are that you all are here tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 皆様がここに いることに感謝いたします

translation.en: And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.ja: クリスマスの精神である 善意と愛が世界を包み

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.ja: 平和の星のように 輝くことを祈ります

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.ja: それでは オリビア王女 お願いします

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
translation.ja: ヒイラギの枝で玄関を飾る

translation.en: ♪ Fa-la-la-la-la, la-la-la-la ♪
translation.ja: ファララララ ララララ

translation.en: ♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
♪ Fa-la-la-la-la, la-la-la-la ♪
translation.ja: ファララララ ララララ

translation.en: ♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
Oh my God! Phew!
